attributes.action: create more youth facilities in scunthorpe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: creating more youth facilities, will reduce the crime in our town, also giving youths a place to "hang out", socialise..will give them something to do stop them getting bored, the more bored the youths are, the less crime and harm that goes on. also doing this will help parents out in the school holidays, giving their children something to do, and to take part in, meeting other youths.

rejection.details: Sorry, this is a matter for your local authority
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
